attributes.title: Don’t download
attributes.review: This app is horrible I took like 3 hours just to download. After it did I opened it and my phone started to glitch out freezings when that has never happened to me. Don’t let me get started with the quality it’s so horrible like it looks like when the first tv was made. The tv look way better.

attributes.title: B
attributes.review: so went I download this app it made my phone glitch and it’s took me three hours to download and I have good Internet and Wi-Fi I am just saying this is not a good app you should not download this app and also and there was emoji’s coming on the screen and I was scared that it damaged my phone so don’t get this app never ever.

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: I downloaded the app and then I started to have sleep paralysis demons appear...but they weren’t ordinary demons...they were like ugly and orange. And then I suddenly realized that this wasn’t just any ordinary ugly and orange sleep paralysis demon...but it was Donald Trump himself haunting my dreams and causing me to sleep less than 1 millisecond a night. I’m tired 🥺😿 0/10 would recommend to a friend unless you wanna be traumatized. Yeah❤️

attributes.title: awful🤦‍♀️🤢
attributes.review: first when i opened the app it sent me to the most outrageous thing ever i saw trumps no no square. i was horrified my pure 12 year old virgin eyes couldn’t be worse. then it said to sign here to support trump. how dare they ask such a thing. i was scrolling down seeing how i can wreck i mean better this pedos life and there was a link and if sent me straight to corn hub. i am disturbed i gave it a 1 star for trump, tinka hessenhefer, and trump supporters. #blacklivesmatter #bluelivesdont matter #defundthepolice #abolishice #justiceforallpolicebrutalityvictims #givethenativestheirlandback. all have a blessed day except for those who support trump, are trump, and tinka hessenhefer🤮😱👤

attributes.title: Stay safe from rona but die of Pneumonia
attributes.review: So disappointed! I really thought that this app was gonna show me the mystical ways of wearing a face garmitte. Instead all I got was a picture of a double chin Cheeto puff. BUYESE it did In deed give me Rona cure. How u may ask? Well it instructed me to drink some bleach. Instructions a bit unclear, I’m on death bed. Thanks trump ! Make sure u take his advice and stay safe from rona! But die of pneumonia.

attributes.title: I’m traumatized 😖
attributes.review:
I downloaded this app to better understand ✨Trumpie✨ and to help me decide who to vote for. But when It downloaded (which took 5 hours 🙄), I opened the app and It stared playing these exact lyrics...

“I climbed out of my head
And watched myself implode 
A thought without a body
Ought to be the shot to take a load off
My brain is poisoned 
And I’m searching for the antidote 
But every time I find it 
My defenses scream out “oh, no you don’t!”
WOaH”

DO YOU KNOW HOW TRAUMATIZING THAT IS! On top of that, It gave me a major headache, which was THE WORSE PAIN I have ever felt in my life. I wouldn’t wish that kind of pain on anyone. 10/10 wouldn’t recommend.

attributes.title: Worse app ever
attributes.review: I got this app and my phone immediately ran out of battery. I am at 4% battery when I was at 50% one minute before downloading this app. Almost as if it’s draining my life battery. Anyway, the picture of this app is going to give me nightmares. And the T spinning looks like a Nazi sign. I just want to clarify I am NOT a Nazi. This is the worst app ever. Do not recommend.

attributes.title: I DONT LIKE THIS APP
attributes.review: i made the biggest mistake getting this app... it made my dad realize he didn't want a family and leave. It also made the toilet paper in my house levitate and throw chicken nuggets at my cat. so now my cat has ketchup on it and is running around the house making it dirty. unless u guys r gonna pay for the damage that was done i'm gonna need this app taken down ASAP... no rocky.

attributes.title: DISGUSTING!!!
attributes.review: this app gave me a medical disease. right after i downloaded it i fell asleep because it knocked me out by the stench it gave my phone!! ugh! it also gave me an std because my lady parts are hurting now 😩. it also deleted everything on my phone!! had to get a new one 😔 it also killed my dog, when i showed him the donald he went into a shock and died. thanks a lot you orange!! 😒

attributes.title: Nasty App
attributes.review: Absolutely horrendous!! This app did nothing except drain my battery and tell me to go back to my own country. It had no accurate information just FALSE NEWS everywhere. I can’t even bring myself to look at it again, extremely ugly and unpleasant for my eyes. I HAD TO WASH THEM OUT!! Please Lord save these people from downloading this horrible app. Just terrible.
